vault_identity_entity_alias.description: Creates an Identity Entity Alias for Vault.

name.description: Name of the alias. Name should be the identifier of the client in the authentication source. For example, if the alias belongs to userpass backend, the name should be a valid username within userpass backend. If alias belongs to GitHub, it should be the GitHub username.

mount_accessor.description: Accessor of the mount to which the alias should belong to.

canonical_id.description: Entity ID to which this alias belongs to.
